posts.postText:
my name is Conner and ever since I heard about you guys I wanted to join and be an admin (hopefully some day),so if I couldn't I still have V.I.P.
I also like eggs,(not really),but I actually like bacon and some other things like brownies! 
I like admins and people who are in high powers that are   NICE   and if they aren't I might as well leave right now.
I am a really nice person,but don't get on bad side because I will start slappin'' granny's like punchin-bags.
Luckily for you it is hard to get on my bad side :))
so the only reason I wanted you people to see this is to know that I am really happy and proud to be apart of this clan.




                                                                          Rookie, 
                                                                          Conner Coleman
Welcome to the forums, remember to read the rules before posting.
